text: Rewi's Last Stand is a 1925 and 1940 New Zealand drama movie directed by Rudall Hayward. The 1925 is the silent movie and the 1940 is the sound movie and are historical drama movies. ==Other websites== *Rewi's Last Stand (1925) at IMDb *Rewi's Last Stand (1940) at IMDb Category:1925 drama movies Category:1940 drama movies Category:New Zealand drama movies Category:Silent movies
title: Rewi's Last Stand
